version_description:
We decided to update just about everything in the app. The highlights of this update include:

o A secondary layout for the home page
o Reminders for upcoming matches
o Related cluster news on home page
o Player statistics comparison
o More views for match graphs such as Worm, Partnership and Manhattan
o Landscape support for full scorecard
o Tournaments page
o Cricket on Twitter
o Filters on Index pages for better usability
o Improved quiz
o Improved Scorecard experience with richer and more relevant content
o Squashed some persistent bugs which refused to die quietly.
o Much needed performance enhancements

- Fixed some defects related to county cricket coverage.
- Critical fixes and performance enhancements

- Link to live streaming of matches on the ESPN Cricket 2015 app from the scorecard of the World Cup matches and access to video highlights from the commentary for users in the US & Caribbean.
- Now, send us your comments for a match from the app!
- Improved World Cup section.
- UI improvements for improved access to content.
- Bug fixes and many performance improvements.

- Introducing the Stats section in the Teams and Series screens! Now stay updated with statistics of your favorite teams and tournaments.
- Performance improvements for faster score updates.
- Bug fixes.

- Launching 'Editor's picks' section in home screen. Now track all handpicked interviews, views, comments from our writers and blogs.
- New and improved Match Center and scorecard area.
- Launching 'Highlights' section in Match center. Now watch match highlights and clippings (only for select matches and select regions).
- Bug fixes.
- Minor design changes.

- Improved live scorecard experience
- Bug fixes

The CricInfo App has been redesigned, this release includes an enhanced match display logic for Cricket, editions and an improved onboarding experience. In addition, users will now benefit from a personalized experience with improved performance and bandwidth optimizations

- Slow internet connection issues resolved
- Other bug fixes

[+] Optimised smoothness for iOS 11 and the new iPhone X
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Don’t have a ESPN Cricinfo account? With this update you can still sign up for alerts without creating one. Now there is no reason to miss out on the latest scores and cricket news.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Looking for more control of your favourites and alerts? We’ve grouped them together and given you a new and improved place to manage all your personalised experiences.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Home Tab will now display scores + news from everything you care about. It will change dynamically throughout the day, based on your favourite teams.
[+] New Look & Feel: We redesigned the app to be the best place to track live games, read Cricket stories, watch videos and to get breaking news. It’s faster, easier to use and built around you.
[+] Bug fixes.

[+] Improved Video Player. New playlists of clips make it easy to browse video, double-tap to skip ahead or rewind ten seconds, go back to previous videos, and haptics while you scrub are just some of the highlights.
[+] Homescreen Improvements. On your homescreen, you will now see a carousel of your favourite teams for quick navigation to check out full schedules, standings, and top news.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Improved Video Player. New playlists of clips make it easy to browse video, double-tap to skip ahead or rewind ten seconds, go back to previous videos, and haptics while you scrub are just some of the highlights.
[+] Homescreen Improvements. On your homescreen, you will now see a carousel of your favourite teams for quick navigation to check out full schedules, standings, and top news.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Alerts just got better! Force touch on video alerts to play clips on your lock screen. Hit the volume buttons on your device for sound.
[+] Optimized for iPhone XR and XS Max.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements

[+] New forward and back 10-second buttons make it easy to jump to the exact spot you want in a video. Pro tip: double tap on the left or right edge to instantly jump 10 seconds.
[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Introducing player search. Now you can search for any Cricket players in the app.
2. Bug fixes and improvements.

- New design
- Live cricket scores carousel on top
- New live scorecard and story reading experience
- Access to major sections of the ESPNcricinfo site
- Performance improvements
- Watch India vs Australia Video match highlights

Latest updates and exciting new features:

- Dark mode for all live scorecard screens
- Live Scores and News Widgets in various sizes
- Share live scores with your friends on WhatsApp and other social platforms
- #AskCricinfo - Statsguru on your fingertips
- Live stats, Forecaster and Smart Scorecard for richer match experience
- Sort match commentary by newest or oldest order
- Compare team scores over-by-over
- Enjoy ESPNcricinfo in Hindi language too

Latest updates and exciting new features:
Dark mode for all live scorecard screens
Live Scores and News Widgets in various sizes
Share live scores with your friends on WhatsApp and other social platforms
#AskCricinfo - Statsguru on your fingertips
Live stats, Forecaster and Smart Scorecard for richer match experience
Sort match commentary by newest or oldest order
Compare team scores over-by-over
Enjoy ESPNcricinfo in Hindi language too

Fixed the pesky defect that was causing the app to crash on certain devices running iOS 7.

We have decided to make our next update more than worthwhile to thank you for the patience with this defect.
